dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.enterprise.risk.ra.viol.RevenueAssuranceViolationSpec
dataStructure.description:
The invariant characteristics of a RevenueAssuranceViolation. Each related RevenueAssuranceViolation instance will have the same invariant characteristics. However, the values associated with other characteristics of the instantiated RevenueAssuranceViolation are specific to each instance.

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: RevenueAssuranceViolationSpec

child.name: description
child.description:
A narrative that explains in detail what the violation spec is.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: description

child.name: validFor
child.description:
The period for which the specification is valid.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: validFor

child.name: name
child.description:
A word, term, or phrase by which a violation specification is known and distinguished from other RevenueAssuranceViolationSpecs.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: name

child.name: revenueAssuranceControlConsequence

child.label: revenueAssuranceControlConsequence
